input.sentences: [male] really enjoyed going to the fair . he rode the swings .
he even won a stuffed gator .
but | when he asked his friend to join him on the ferris wheel | his friend turned him down .
so | he skipped his favorite ride .
output.sentences: The swings at the amusement park were ridden by a male.
At this amusement park, a little boy simultaneously played games.
He won the game and was awarded a stuffed gator.
After riding the ferris wheel, the boy was joined by a friend.
His friend was prone to motion sickness, so they skipped the ferris wheel ride, which was his favorite.
